casebody.data:
PENDER COUNTY
v.
BARTLETT. No. 103A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 10, 2006. Carl W. Thurman, III, for Pender County, et al. Tiare B. Smiley, Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for Gary Bartlett, et al. Julius L. Chambers, John Charles Boger, Charlotte, for Moore, Farrior & Jordan.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of May 2006 by Cindy Moore, Milford Farrior and Mary Jordan for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(l). By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of May 2006."
